channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- MF258
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- MF258

item.title: CVE-2023-41781|2024-08-02T19:09:48.212Z -- zte -- mf258
item.description: There is a Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ZTE MF258. Due to insufficient input validation of SMS interface parameter, an XSS attack will be triggered.
